Speaking

Selected Talks

Developers Can't Understand Design

(And other completely untrue design myths.) De-mystifying the design process in web development and giving developers resources to learn more about design. I presented an earlier version of this talk with the title, "Developers Can't Design," several times during 2012.

  • Slides available

  • Video available

  • Resources available soon

Teaching Our CSS To Play Nice

Discussing CSS organization, tools, frameworks, pre-compilers, best practices and its overall role in the collaborative web development process.

  • Slides available

  • Resources available soon

How To Change the World with a Girl and a Computer

Examining the statistics and role of women in technology, and my experiences improving both through Girl Develop It Columbus.

  • Slides available

  • Video available

Unlocking the Clubhouse

Developing software education and practices for diverse beginners.

  • Slides available

Teaching

I regularly teach beginner HTML/CSS classes as a part of Girl Develop It Columbus. My class slides and resources are freely available at the GDIC HTML/CSS class materials page.
